divs: Sighting Detailsi work for a construction company driving a 70 ton truck. i was sitting under the trackhoe waiting for my load, when i noticed 3 stars together in the shape of a pyramid.one at 12 o'clock, one at 2 o'clock and the third at 8 o'clock. at first i thought they were just regular stars but then they slowly started to move together in the very same configuration as they had previously been seen. they also started bliking periodically and were moving extremely slow. i would not have noticed it, but, i was always sitting in the exact same spot and they ----- WERE NOT!!!!!!!!! p.s i thought at the time it was nothing, but now i am not so sure. Very strange.it moved out of sight finally over the eastern mountains in n. salt lake. m. parks
Summary: 3 stars converged in a pyramid form
trends: There has been one other sighting in North Salt Lake
There were no other sightings in North Salt Lake on or around September 13th 2008
